glossary.label: Initializing npm
glossary.text: this is the most recommended way of initializing chasi, please note that this step requires node, npm and git installed in your environment.

glossary.label: via chasi-cli
glossary.text: this requires chasi-cli to be globally installed on the system.

glossary.label: Getting Started
glossary.text: there is a template of environment file right after installation (./template.env), which can be copied as a reference for setting up a .env file.
